alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 3:47PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Juab and southwestern Utah Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 347 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rocky Ridge, or 9 miles southwest of Payson, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Payson, Santaquin, Rocky Ridge, Spring Lake, West Mountain, Elberta, Benjamin, Lake Shore, Utah Lake, Genola and Goshen. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 238 and 253. US Route 6 between mile markers 150 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Utah Valley
